title: List of all Androidlocation   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidlocation   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-ReactiveLocation
repoList.description: Small library that wraps Google Play Service API in brilliant RxJava Observables reducing boilerplate to minimum.

repoList.name: android-location-tracker
repoList.description: Android helper that tracks user location

repoList.name: smart-location-lib
repoList.description: Android library project that lets you manage the location updates to be as painless as possible

repoList.name: RxLocation
repoList.description: 🗺 [DEPRECATED] Reactive Location APIs Library for Android and RxJava 2

repoList.name: LocationHelper
repoList.description: Android library project that helps you to track user location and manage the updates.

repoList.name: MockLocationDetector
repoList.description: An android library to help detect mock locations

repoList.name: mad-location-manager
repoList.description: Mad Location Manager is a library for GPS and Accelerometer data "fusion" with Kalman filter

repoList.name: jail-monkey
repoList.description: A React Native library for identifying if a phone is rooted or mocking locations

repoList.name: easydeviceinfo
repoList.description: :iphone: [Android Library] Get device information in a super easy way.

repoList.name: MapDrawingTools
repoList.description: this library Drawing polygon, polyline and points in Google Map and return coordinates to your App
